Items.text: You can see here that we have placed some cells on the microscope slide.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: The blue cell we call a 'hero cell'.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: And the red cell is a 'villain cell'.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: We are able to control the hero cells, try moving yours around!
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: Use the arrow keys to move the cell around
